title: Police investigating after man found dead in Shelby County residence
description: The Shelby County Sheriff's Office has not made any arrests, and the investigation is ongoing.
content:
The Shelby County Sheriff's Office is investigating a homicide after a man, who has not been identified, was found dead in his Spring Oaks Estates home, according to a news release.

Deputies responded to a call regarding a person found unresponsive on Aug. 20 at around 5:10 p.m. When deputies arrived, they found a man who was later pronounced dead at the scene.

Officials with the Shelby County Sheriff's Office said no arrests have been made, and the investigation is ongoing.

The sheriff's office is asking anyone with information to contact Capt. Blake Lisby or Detective Kyle Washburn at 502-633-4324.

More police news: 'I can’t just give up on my kids:' Louisville jail error forces mom to stay vigilant
summary: The Shelby County Sheriff's Office is investigating a homicide after a man was found dead in his Spring Oaks Estates home on August 20. The man, who has not been identified, was pronounced dead at the scene. No arrests have been made and the sheriff's office is asking for information about the incident.
shortSummary: The Shelby County Sheriff's Office is investigating a homicide involving a man found dead in his Spring Oaks Estates home, with no arrests made.
